x-koha-hack.description:
Definitions is left empty because online.swagger.io/validator/debug doesn't allow non-object primitive types with multivalue type, eg 'type = [string, null]', in /definitions/*
These are referenced directly wherever they are used so there is no need for /definitions anyway.

error.description:
http://online.swagger.io/validator/debug  doesn't like our schema if we simply define 'definitions': {'$ref': 'definitions.json'}
 use the minified version instead
